newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT- Southern Pacific Fund begun.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT- Southern Pacific Fund begun.

text.p: -- Oppenheimer & Co analyst Steven Eisman has started coverage of Southern Pacific Funding Corp with a rating of outperform, a source at the firm said on Tuesday.
-- Eisman set a 12-month price target for the stock of $41 to $43. The analyst was not available for comment.
-- Shares of the Lake Oswego, Ore., specialty finance company closed Monday at 34-3/8, close to its 12-month high.
